transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir, namaskar ji.
Customer: Namaskar ji, kya haal hai sir?
Executive: Bas main theek hoon ji, aap bataiye sir.
Customer: Bas theek hai, pehchan liya aapne?
Executive: Haan ji, pehchan liya, bataiye sir.
Customer: Accha.
Customer: Mera manager bol raha hai, kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Mera manager bol raha hai, kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Manager hi baat kar rahe hain sir, bataiye aap.
Customer: Nahi, mujhe support kaun karta hai? Call aata hai ki sir Shivam ka aata hai, kiska aata hai?
Executive: Nahi, Ankur Singh ka aata hai sir aur meri abhi last week hi baat hui hai aapse.
Customer: Accha, Ankur aap hi ho?
Executive: Haan, Ankur main hi hoon sir, maine WhatsApp bhi kiya hua hai already regular basis pe.
Customer: Accha, main ye keh raha ki inquiry refer karu toh kya milega IndiaMART ke liye?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Aapko ek inquiry refer karu toh kya milega IndiaMART ke liye?
Executive: Inquiry refer kaise matlab sir?
Executive: Main call back karta hoon sir apne number se, main call back karta hoon sir, theek hai? Aap mujhe thoda time dijiye, main call back karta hoon aapko, theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know benefits of inquiry referral.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back to explain.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiry, referral, callback
